japanese:
（あいつが指定したのはここだ。
　どこかに――）
translation:
(This is the place she specified.
 Somewhere around here%p-2;――%p;)

japanese: （……見つけた！）
translation: (...Found her!)

japanese: 誰に、会いに来たのですか？
translation: Who did you come to meet?

japanese: お前だ、一花。
translation: You, Ichika.

japanese: 俺はお前が――
translation: I really%p-2;――

japanese: ちょ、ちょっと待った！
translation: W-wait a second!

japanese:
えっ！？
なんだよ急に、俺はまだ――
translation:
Huh?!
What the, all of a sudden? I haven't even%p-2;――

japanese:
ほ、ほら！
ここだと、ちょっと人目がね！？
translation:
L-look!
There are people watching here, right?!

japanese: こっち！　こっち来て！
translation: Come on! Follow me!

japanese: おい！　どこ行くんだ！？
translation: Hey! Where're you goin'?!

japanese: いいから早くするっ！！
translation: Just hurry up already!!

japanese:
はぁ……はぁ……。
つ、疲れた……。
ここまでほぼ全力疾走させやがって……。
translation:
Huff... Huff...
I-I'm tired...
You made me sprint almost at full speed...

japanese:
わ、私もだよ！
誰のせいだと思ってるの！？
translation:
W-well, so am I!
Who do you think's to blame?!

japanese: 誰のせいって……俺なのか？
translation: Who's to blame... Is it me?

japanese:
……違うね。
私が国際通りって決めたんだし。
translation:
...No, it's not.
I decided on Kokusai dori, after all.

japanese:
はぁぁぁぁ……。
待ち合わせ場所、失敗したぁ。
translation:
*sigh*
That meeting spot was a failure.

japanese:
ったく。
別にホテルまで戻らなくてもよかっただろ。
translation:
Jeez.
We didn't have to come all the way back to the hotel,
did we?

japanese:
……あ。
ここもある意味、安心じゃなかったり？
translation:
...Ah.
In a way, this place
isn't exactly reassuring either, huh?

japanese: なんだそりゃ。
translation: What's that supposed to mean?

japanese: もう、君はノリが悪いなぁ。
translation: Well, you're not exactly good at going with the flow.

japanese:
まあ、お前の場合は
どこで誰に見られてるかわからないしな。
translation:
I mean, in your case,
you never know who might see you where.

japanese:
ここ数日で嫌というほど思い知らされた。
女優ってのは大変なんだな。
translation:
I've learned that well enough in the past few days.
Being an actress is tough, huh?

japanese: ……そういうのじゃない。
translation: ...That's not what I meant.

japanese: は？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
わ、私だって、告白される時は
こんなのがいいなって夢見てたりするんですっ！
translation:
E-even I have had dreams of being confessed 
to by someone in this way!

japanese:
もっとこうロマンチックな場所でとか！
少なくとも２人きりがいい！
translation:
Except in a more romantic place!
At least with just the two of us!

japanese:
んなこと言われても。
あの場所を指定したのはお前だろうが。
translation:
Even if you say that.
You were the one who specified that spot,
weren't you?

japanese: ……だって、来ないと思ってたから。
translation: ...Well, I didn't think you'd actually come.

japanese:
はぁ……。
あんだけ積極的になっておいてよく言うぜ。
translation:
*sigh*
You're one to talk, being as proactive as you were.

japanese: エメラルドビーチじゃ、ノリノリで絡んできただろ？
translation:
You were all energetic and clingy
at Emerald Beach, right?

japanese:
えっ？
あの時、私だってわかってたの？
translation:
Huh?
Did you actually know it was me back then?

japanese: ああ、やっぱりそうだったのか。
translation: Ah, so it was you, after all.

japanese:
あれ、もしかして鎌かけられた？
それとも勘だったり？
translation:
Wait, were you trying to
lure me into your trap at that time?
Or did you just have a hunch?

japanese:
あの時は、なんとなく感じただけだったけどな。
素直になれとか、あんなからかい方すんのは
一花だなって思ったんだよ。
translation:
At that time, I just had a vague feeling.
Saying something like 'be more honest,'
I thought that you were playing a trick on me.

japanese: そっか……。
translation: I see...

japanese:
もちろん君に選んでほしいとは思ってた。
でも……。
translation:
Of course, I wanted you to make a choice.
But...

japanese:
なんだよ。
他に理由があるなら、はっきり言ってくれ。
translation:
What is it?
If there's another reason, just tell me straight.

japanese:
あはは……。
まあ、そうだけどさ。
translation:
Ahaha...
Well, I guess so.

japanese:
もちろん君に選んでほしいとは思ってた。
でも……。
translation:
Of course, I wanted you to choose me.
But...

japanese:
なんだよ。
他に理由があるなら、はっきり言ってくれ。
translation:
What is it?
If there's another reason, just tell me straight.

japanese: ……君のためなの。
translation: ...It's for your sake.

japanese: いや、意味がわからん。
translation: Wait. I don't understand.

japanese:
だから、君って格好つける割に
案外、意気地なしなところあるし？
translation:
I mean, despite your attempts to act cool,
you're surprisingly stubborn, you know?

japanese:
こうして逃げ場をなくしてあげれば、
いくら君でも、今度は答えを出してくれるかなって。
translation:
So, by cornering you like this,
maybe you'd finally give me an answer.

japanese: お前なぁ……。
translation: You...

japanese: ほら、また優柔不断なことをされても困るからさ。
translation: Look, we didn't want you to keep being indecisive.

japanese:
それで、どう？
効果あった？
translation: So, how about it? Did it work?

japanese:
……まったく。
姉妹のことならまだしも、
なんで俺の世話まで焼こうとしてるんだよ。
translation:
…Geez.
I mean, I get why you take care of your sisters,
but why are you trying to take care of me?

japanese:
だって私、お姉ちゃんだから。
それであの子たちの想いが叶うのなら、ね。
translation:
Because I'm their big sister.
If it helps their feelings come true, then...

japanese: （……そういうことか）
translation: (...So that's what it is.)

japanese:
姉妹に加えて俺までとは。
長女だからって面倒見が良すぎだ。
translation:
And I suppose I'm included in with the sisters. 
You're just too caring as the eldest daughter.

japanese: もしかして惚れ直しちゃった？
translation: Could it be that you've fallen in love with me again?

japanese:
ああ。
俺はお前が好きだ。
他でもない、そんな一花がな。
translation:
Yeah.
I like you, Ichika.
No one else but you.

japanese:
そうやって妹たちのことを想う優しさも、
夢や自分自身のために、強くあろうとする姿も。
translation:
It's that tenderness you have for your sisters,
and your determination to be strong
for your dreams, and for yourself.

japanese:
そのせいで無理をしたり、
自分自身を追い詰めてしまうようなところも――
translation:
But because of that, 
you overdo it sometimes 
and push yourself into a corner%p-2;――

japanese: その、全部が好きなんだ。
translation: And yet I love all of that.

japanese: 私も、君のことが好き。
translation: Me too, I love you.

japanese: ……やっと聞けたな。
translation: ...I finally got to hear it.

japanese:
そうだっけ？
……嬉しかった？
translation:
Is that so?
...You happy?

japanese: ああ、嬉しい。
translation: Yeah, I'm happy.

japanese:
でも『やっと』って？
もしかして……。
translation:
But 'finally?'
Could it be...?

japanese:
（あ……。
　いま俺、確かに『やっと』って言ったな）
translation:
(Ah...
 I did say 'finally,' didn't I.)

japanese:
お前はあの時、全部嘘って言ったが。
嘘じゃないこともあってほしいって――
translation:
You said everything back then was a lie.
But I want there to be some truths among the lies%p-2;――

japanese: 俺は、どこかでずっと思っていたのかもしれない。
translation: I might have always thought that somewhere.

japanese: そう、なんだ。
translation: I see.

japanese:
ねえフータロー君。
私、本当は優しくなんてないかもしれないよ。
それでもいいの？
translation:
Hey, Futaro-kun.
I might not really be a kind person.
Is that okay?

japanese:
へえ。
じゃあ、そういうお前も見せてくれよ。
遠慮する必要なんてないぞ。
translation:
Oh, really?
Then show me that side of you too.
You don't have to hold back.

japanese: えっ……？
きっと俺は、そんなお前も好きになっちまうからさ。
translation:
I'm sure I'll end up
falling in love with that side of you too.

japanese: ああ、もう……君には敵わないなぁ。
translation: Ahh, come on... I can't compete with you.

japanese:
だが恋ってのはそういうもんだろ？
俺もようやく、そいつを学べた気がする。
translation:
But that's just how love works, right?
I feel like I've finally learned that.

japanese: ……うん。
translation: ...Yeah.

japanese:
私だって、君の全部を好きになっちゃうし、
私の全部を好きになってほしいんだ……。
translation:
I want to love every part of you,
and I want you to love every part of me too...
